## Utils.ValidationHelpers.toCanonical() method

Converts a supplied `unknown` to the canonical form of the tag validated by these helpers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toCanonical(from: unknown, context?: TC): Result<T>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

The `unknown` to be converted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

context


</td><td>

TC


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional context used in the conversion.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;T&gt;

`Success` with the corresponding canonical value, or `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
